item.title: US says progress made at talks with Ukraine on plan to end war
item.description: Talks between senior US and Ukrainian negotiators in Florida continue for a third day on Saturday.

item.title: Deadly border fighting breaks out between Pakistan and Afghanistan
item.description: Both sides accuse the other of starting the overnight fighting and breaching a fragile ceasefire agreed in October.

item.title: Watch: Flames and thick smoke engulf plane in Brazil after fire breaks out
item.description: Equipment on the tarmac at Brazil’s São Paulo airport caught fire, with the blaze rapidly surrounding a plane and forcing the evacuation of 169 passen...

item.title: Legendary architect Frank Gehry dies aged 96
item.description: Frank Gehry was acclaimed for his love of jagged angles and use of industrial materials.

item.title: Moment officers wrangle 600lb alligator from Florida road
item.description: At least seven deputies and a skilled trapper were needed to remove the 14ft (4.2m) reptile, which was later released at an alligator farm.
